| Word | Lemma | Part of Speech | Gender | Number | Person | Tense | Mood | Note | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | trattando | trattare | v. | | sg. | 3rd | present | participle | | | l’ | lo | art. | m. | pl. | | | | | | ombre | ombra | n. | f. | pl. | | | | | | come | come | prep. | | | | | | | | cosa | cosa | n. | f. | sg. | | | | | | salda | saldo | adj. | f. | sg. | | | | |
Note:
* The verb "trattare" is in the present participle form, which is used to describe an ongoing action or state of being. * The article "l'" is a contraction of "lo" and "le", and it is used to refer to the feminine plural noun "ombre". * The preposition "come" is used to compare two things, in this case the shadows to a solid object. * The noun "cosa" is used to refer to a general or unspecified thing. * The adjective "salda" means "solid" or "firm".
